newsitem.title: USA: Prince Bandar says Saudi economy improving.
newsitem.headline: Prince Bandar says Saudi economy improving.

text.p: Saudi Arabia's economy is improving and economic indicators are heading in the right direction, Prince Bandar, Saudi ambassador to the United States, said Wednesday.
"It's improving in a very positive way and we're very optimistic," he told reporters after speaking at a U.S.-Saudi Business Council dinner.
"All the economic indicators are heading the right way and I think we're seeing the end of the hard times," Bandar said.
He added that the 14-year string of deficit spending will come to an end this year.
